pages.title: Welcome! Let's get started.
pages.description: This is the Parent Dashboard. From here, you can select a child to play as, or manage your family's profiles and settings.

pages.title: Manage Your Children
pages.description: This is where you add or edit profiles for your children. You can upload photos to help personalize their story's illustrations.

pages.title: Create Your Book
pages.description: After a story is finished, come here to turn it into a book! Use the 'Create My Book' panel to compile the text, build the pages, and paint the art.

pages.title: Ready to Play!
pages.description: Now you're all set. Select a child from the main dashboard to start creating a magical story together.
